about_the_game:
Overview:
Embark on a thrilling RPG adventure set in the matriarchal world of Draconia, where women rule with an iron fist and men must fight for survival. In this femdom-themed game, you'll navigate a brutal society, manage resources, and make critical choices that determine your fate.

Gameplay:
As a prisoner in the Draconian mining camp, your goal is to survive and ultimately gain your freedom. The game features classic RPG mechanics, including exploration, resource management, and decision-making.

You'll need to work in the mines to earn money, while carefully managing your hunger and stamina. Explore the treacherous mines in search of the legendary Alanothian Crystal, which can be exchanged for your freedom. Be cautious, as the mines are filled with dangers and challenges that will test your skills and resolve.

Throughout your journey, you'll interact with powerful female characters who will influence your path. Your choices and actions will have consequences, leading to multiple endings based on the decisions you make. Will you try to escape the camp, submit to the evil women, or find another way to gain your freedom?

Key Features:

  • RPG Mechanics: Classic RPG gameplay with exploration, resource management, and decision-making.
  • Survival Aspects: Manage your hunger and stamina while working in the mines to survive.
  • Femdom Theme: Experience a dark, matriarchal world where women hold all the power.
  • Multiple Endings: Your choices throughout the game will lead to different outcomes and endings.

Do you have what it takes to survive in the unforgiving world of Draconia? Make your choices wisely, manage your resources carefully, and maybe, just maybe, you'll find a way to break free and find freedom again.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game "Survival in Draconia" contains some storylines and scenes that depict or allude to sexual assault and non-consensual sexual acts. While not extremely graphic or explicit, these themes are present as the main character faces difficult situations due to hunger and financial hardship.

In a few quests, the main character is propositioned to engage in sex work under circumstances of financial coercion and pressured consent. The player can choose how to respond, but should be aware that these themes of sexual violence and non-consensual acts are included in the game's narrative. No explicit sexual acts are shown on screen.

Players who are sensitive to content related to sexual assault, non-consensual sex, or sex work should carefully consider before purchasing or playing Survival in Draconia.

All interactions and themes within the game are part of a fictional narrative meant for mature audiences, and are not intended to condone or endorse real-world violence or non-consensual acts. The content is for entertainment purposes only and does not reflect the views of the developer.

name: Survival In Draconia

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: CPU: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Not an integrated video card; DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
  • VR Support: No

Gewalt

short_description: Survival in Draconia is a femdom 2D Fantasy RPG set in a continent where dominant women reign supreme. Navigate a harsh landscape, manage your resources, and find your place in a society where survival is anything but guaranteed.
